A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay so the movie isn't bad by any means of movie standards. But any long time Star Wars fan will be really really disappointed with this one. It doesn't ever feel like a Star Wars movie to me for one. 2 Just was not a fan of the story and the path it went down multiple characters who were hyped up were HUGE let downs. 3 Maybe the cheesiest scene in any Star Wars movie imo\, it involves Leia and without spoilers just know I personally hated the scene. Not because of WHAT she does but how she does it. 4 Rose. I hate her. I hope she dies first scene of episode 9.
